## getCanonicalPageId variable

Gets the canonical, display-friendly version of a page's ID for use in URLs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCanonicalPageId: (pageId: string, recordMap: ExtendedRecordMap, { uuid }?: {
    uuid?: boolean;
}) => string | null
```
